title: How to Make Pan Fried Starfruit

steps.headline: Wash the starfruit.
steps.description: Ensure that all dirt is removed.

steps.headline: Place the starfruit slices in a pre-warmed skillet or frying pan.
steps.description: Add about 2 tablespoons of butter or oil.

steps.headline: Cook over a gentle heat.
steps.description: Cook until browned slightly on one side.

steps.headline: Remove from the heat.
steps.description: Pile on a plate for serving.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: Drizzle a little honey over the pile of starfruit slices per plate. Enjoy.

text: Wash the starfruit. Ensure that all dirt is removed. Slice into ⁄4 inch (0.6 cm) slices.  Place the starfruit slices in a pre-warmed skillet or frying pan. Add about 2 tablespoons of butter or oil. Salt to taste.  Cook over a gentle heat. Cook until browned slightly on one side. Flip the starfruit slices over. Salt this side to taste. Cook to brown slightly.  Remove from the heat. Pile on a plate for serving. Serve. Drizzle a little honey over the pile of starfruit slices per plate. Enjoy.
